protein.general_function: Involved in hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds, in linear amides
protein.specific_function: Hydrolyzes only phytoceramide into phytosphingosine and free fatty acid. Does not have reverse activity.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds
hydrolase activity, acting on carbon-nitrogen (but not peptide) bonds, in linear amides

reference.reference_text: Mao C, Xu R, Szulc ZM, Bielawska A, Galadari SH, Obeid LM: Cloning and characterization of a novel human alkaline ceramidase. A mammalian enzyme that hydrolyzes phytoceramide. J Biol Chem. 2001 Jul 13;276(28):26577-88. Epub 2001 May 16.
